body_html:
Maybe these are excluded in our crosstool intentionally?
Is it possible that the following was the cause to make such a decision?
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/780902/nvcc-with-avx-support-cannot-find-gcc-builtin-intrinsics/
Does the above still apply?

body:
Maybe these are excluded in our crosstool intentionally?
Is it possible that the following was  the cause to make such a decision?
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/780902/nvcc-with-avx-support-cannot-find-gcc-builtin-intrinsics/
Does the above still apply?
